name: Futanari Sex - Naughty Visit
description:
About the game
An erotic visual novel about a woman visiting a friend in her new luxurious apartment. Everything takes a turn when Clara's secret comes out.
Visual Novel Description
Clara recently moved into a luxury apartment on her own.
Alice, an old friend, decides to surprise her and pays her a visit.
Amazed by the glass walls of the bathroom, she asks if she can take a quick shower.
Although Clara feels a bit intimidated, she invites her friend to do whatever she likes.
Little by little, the situation is heating up and Clara's secret comes out.
Features
- 50+ HD renders
- Animations
